verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: slammed] [ARG1: Amazon chief Jeff Bezos] [ARGM-TMP: yet again] [ARGM-LOC: in his war against the billionaire businessman] and advised Washington Post staff to go on strike .

President Donald Trump slammed Amazon chief Jeff Bezos yet again in his war against the billionaire businessman and advised [ARG0: Washington Post staff] to [V: go] [ARG1: on strike] .
